I say that it is necessary to make the patient lie on an elevated pillow; then pull the suspensory ligament of the testicles towards the lower parts; and pull the ligaments of the genitals with the aforementioned ties towards the rod; and hold those other ministers (assistants) that you have, and stretch them with strong extension.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And then make an incision with a broad, sharp spathula in a transverse direction into the vessels until they are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And then remove all parts as we have said in the extraction of hernia, which are in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	And then place a needle in which there is double thread, and tie it at the beginning of the places where hernia occurs, and tie the other end at the back of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	And then make an incision in the middle location for a straight section according to the length of the body, and extract what has accumulated from the putrid and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then treat the wound with the treatment of other wounds where there is a desire for healing to occur, so that the vessels which nourish one of the two testicles do not fall, for it is not harmful.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if hernia occurs in all the vessels, then it is necessary to extract the testicles or that the testicles are cut off with the vessels because they are deprived of all nourishment by the incision of the vessels, and that they become atrophied, or that they are removed so that they are not helpful for those.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to a section that occurs in the cephalic region extended over the abdomen from some of the intestines of the stomach, so that when these intestines come out of that rupture, they enter into it.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the cephalic region or from its absence, and these two types occur for many reasons: impact, coughing, shouting, lifting heavy objects, or similar things. [http://medieval-spanish.stanford.edu/13texts/torregiano/Torregiano\_13.html](http://medieval-spanish.stanford.edu/13texts/torregiano/Torregiano_13.html)
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this, when it is due to extension of the cephalic region, is that it occurs gradually over a long period of time and not suddenly, and it is an abscess that forms inside towards the preon because the cephalic region compresses the intestines.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of this, when it is due to section of the cephalic region, is that at the beginning it causes violent pain suddenly; and it appears as a diverse abscess below the apparent swollen area, and this is because of protrusion of the intestine, and the body is outside the cephalic region. [http://medieval-spanish.stanford.edu/13texts/torregiano/Torregiano\_13.html](http://medieval-spanish.stanford.edu/13texts/torregiano/Torregiano_13.html)
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the intestines are expelled with the membrane, and this is called an incarcerated intestinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is formed with flatulence, and sometimes it occurs in a split intestine and becomes trapped there, and this causes great danger to the patient, and sometimes it causes severe pain that worsens when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of the types of this illness with iron, there is fear because it is necessary to avoid injury in that area.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the method of the operation for this is to command the patient to reposition the intestine with their hand towards the inner parts of its cavity if they obey its return, and then be covered with your hands and place them on their hips, and lift their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then stretch the cord that ties the cord of the testicles towards the upper parts, and make an incision in the entire length of the cord of the testicles; and then place two hooks on both sides of the section to open it with those hooks as needed.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the section is according to the amount that is possible for you so that the vein is expelled from it.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then remove the covering of the cephalic region that is below the cord of the testicles, until the hard white part of each side of it is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	And then insert your finger in what ties the testicle, in that which is between the white cephalic part, which is below the cord of the vein, and between the cephalic region itself; and separate it with the adhesion that is in the backside of the vein.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then hold the cord of the testicles with your hand towards the outer parts, and extend the white cephalic part upwards with your left hand, and lift the vein with the cephalic region towards the location of the incision; and command your assistant to stretch the vein upwards, while you dissolve the adhesion that is behind with a complete solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And make sure with your fingers that there is no cause of the intestine wrapped in the hard white cephalic part.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause in it, then pull that towards the lower abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle in which there is thick thread made of wax and dipped in a solution of six herbs, and insert that into the backside of the cephalic region, which is below the cord of the testicles, where the incision was made; and then make four incisions in the protruding ends of the thread inside until they are completely embedded in it, and shape them in some way like a cross; and tie it strongly with two parts to the cephalic region that we said is below the cord of the testicles.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the ends of the threads and tie them strongly until some of the vessels that nourish those do not send any cause for an abscess to form there.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And then place another ligature as close to the first ligature as possible, but at least three digits away from it; and let these two ligatures remain below the cephalic region that is below the cord of the testicles by a length equivalent to the size of the digit, and make an incision in the remaining part according to its roundness, and remove the vein from it.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then make an incision in the area below the cord of the testicles for a section from which blood and healing flow as we have recommended in what we said before.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then apply wool soaked in oil and place it on the wound; and administer the ligature that we recommended (and sometimes the white cephalic part is cauterized, which we said before causes fear of bleeding during the incision, because often this occurs); and leave the ligature until it falls off by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if healing is delayed, then apply hot water and place it on top until it falls off as we said before.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And take care of the wound with other treatments for wounds until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66.
De hernia ventosa.	Chapter 66: On Ventral Hernia
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this type of hernia, I have not seen anyone who has been brave enough to attempt its cure using iron instruments.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first (doctors) said that it is made in the same way as we have recommended for the hernia that is in the groin; which is to tie off the veins near the incision with ease and then make an incision in the middle location around the abscess, until the veins fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound in the way we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Chapter 67: On Disruption in the Intestines
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes a rupture occurs in the sinews as we have said, and protrudes from the location.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	The intestines should not be allowed to descend into the groin; and if they do, it should only be a little; and they will return upward in all cases.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if this is prolonged, then a fissure must be made in the abdomen so that the intestines can descend into the abdomen; and this happens due to the stretching of the abdominal muscles which are in the sinews as we have said, which causes the abdominal muscles to stretch, become soft, and form an abscess and protrude.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for this is with cautery as has been described earlier.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	Sometimes it is cured with iron in this manner: the patient lies on their back between your hands and you dry the location of the rupture from the abscesses that protrude with a section along its length according to three fingers wide.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white abdomen which is below the ribcage so that it becomes exposed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the rod and place it on the prominent location of the abdomen, and press it firmly against the patient's belly.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew together the two prominent locations on the end of the rod of the abdomen, and bind one to the other with sutures.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the end of the rod without penetrating the abdomen completely, nor extend the belly or cause any other harm as you know in the treatment of intestinal hernias.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then cure this with the treatment of wounds and clean it when you insert the fields, and restore the wound so that it heals and the area of the rupture is strengthened; for the abdomen contracts and does not allow the protrusion to be corrected.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautionery is better in this location, for it is closer to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter LXVIII
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the groin area around the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Often the groin area around the testicles becomes soft in some men because the flesh between it is softened and this occurs due to neglect.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for the person responsible for treating this condition to make the patient lie on their back and pull up all the softened groin area over the natural groin and then sew together two lips of flesh with sutures.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if desired, you can first sew the excess softened groin area with three or four stitches and firm sutures.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then insert between the stitches, and then cure with the treatment of wounds until it heals and the fields fall off.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter LXIX
De castracio.	On castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that in our religion, castration is forbidden; but it is necessary for me to mention it in this book, and the mention of it is not required except for two reasons, one of which is so that it is part of the doctor's knowledge when he is questioned about it, that he knows how to treat it if it occurs; and the other reason is that we often need castration of other animals for our livestock such as mules, oxen, pigs, and similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And so I say that castration is done in two ways: either by crushing or by cutting through to make an incision.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in the method of castration by crushing, the procedure for the operation is to submerge the animal in hot water until its testicles become soft and loose and hang down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take hold of them with your hand until they are relaxed and do not appear under the skin.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in the method of castration by incision and cutting, it is necessary to hold the animal and press its groin area with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then tie up the spermatic cord and make an incision on each testicle with a cut deep enough to process two of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then suture any pustules that you have lanced.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave anything on the abdomen, but instead apply a light bandage which is above the wound.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration by crushing is better because it leaves no residue from the testicles and allows the animal to continue desiring coitus.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then cure the wound until it heals.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter LXX
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men can occur in two ways: one is that a space appears in the groin area of the testicles, between two testicles, and this looks like a woman's labia.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes the urethra that is in the groin area of the testicles becomes blocked.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	But in women, it is a different type: and that is when the labia of the woman above the pubic bone looks like two testicles of a man slightly minimized at the outer end, just like the scrotum and testicles of a man.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the treatment is of three kinds, two for men and one for women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is necessary to suture the swollen flesh until the inflammation subsides and then cure those with the treatment of other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second type of men where the urethra is in the groin area of the testicles, there is neither a cure nor an operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	On eyelashes and protruding flesh caused by women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Eyelashes that are slightly prominent due to natural causes can be corrected with proper care and attention, but sometimes in some women they become so prominent that they spread out like those of men and even interfere with sexual intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, it is necessary to hold the excess eyelashes with your hand or tweezers and cut them.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not delay in carrying out the incision, especially in the region of the bladder, to prevent bleeding.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then treat that wound with care until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Newly born flesh is the flesh that forms in the womb and fills it up, which easily comes out in parts similar to a tail (and for this reason I will call this condition "tailed disease"); therefore, we must incise in the same way as we do for an abscess, and care for it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter 72.
De curacio de alratica.	On the treatment of pleurisy.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Pleurisy is when a woman's chest is not pierced, or has a small hole in it.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it can be either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	An accidental pleurisy is caused by a disease that has occurred beforehand, and this can be brought about either by flesh that has not been properly adjusted or by a thin or dense substance.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	An accidental pleurisy can be caused by an infection in the mother's womb, inflammation of the ribs, or a swelling in the upper or lower part of the body, and it can prevent sleep, physical exertion, and childbirth, and often delays menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	The diagnosis of this condition can be made by observing the mother's symptoms, if they are obvious, then note them down. But if they are not obvious, then examine the patient using your hands or a probe.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to a thin substance and is located near the two lips (presumably referring to the labia of the female genitalia), then you should apply pressure and break it open.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And place your fingers on the two lips and then gently press them with both hands using your fingertips.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And have the woman lie on her back with her buttocks raised and legs spread apart, then use gentle but firm pressure to open up the two lips until the thin substance is broken through and the obstruction is cleared.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Then take some wool and soak it in oil, place it on the area and cover it with a cloth to prevent the incision from becoming infected.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the substance is thick and dense, then you must make an incision with a spatula or a leaf of myrtle.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to a tumor or swelling, then use a hook to suspend it and make an incision there.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And use these medications that stop bleeding without causing pain, such as henbane, dragon's blood, and alum mixed with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And administer a wide lead cannula so that the wound does not close too quickly and become infected.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And keep the wound open for several days, applying a poultice made from the dry powder of the plant.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then treat it with the usual treatment for healing until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes it happens that other flesh is born in the womb, and then you must proceed in this manner.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is caused by a hard abscess in the womb, then you should not use any iron instruments at all on the abscess.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter 73.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the treatment of hemorrhoids and piles and red botches that occur in the female genitalia.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are a prolapse of dilated veins in which continuous bleeding occurs, and when they become chronic and develop ulcers.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And I have already said in the classification what their species are and what their signs are, and I will now say which ones receive treatment and which ones do not.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore I say that hemorrhoids and ulcers, when they are inside the womb and do not appear to the senses, should not be treated with iron instruments in such cases.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those that are in the opening of the womb and can be felt with the senses are those that should be treated.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is necessary to place the woman in a hot bath and then extend her thighs with forceps or rough cloth, and cut those hemorrhoids with scissors.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then apply powder to those areas using the blood flow from one of the incisive powders without pain, such as henbane and similar to it.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then wrap her feet in bandages for an hour, and then place her in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if there is persistent bleeding, then make a concoction of willow and corn silk and walnuts and similar things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour made from barley and mix it with honey, vinegar, and wine, and make a poultice with that and apply it to the patient's back.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the bleeding has stopped, that's good; and if not, then use two suction cups, and make incisions in the nipples.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take wool and soak it in juice from clover or juice from ragwort or juice from vervain with diluted wine, and attach it to the affected area. Then cure the area with ointment until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But if the condition is severe and requires rough treatment, then it is necessary to cut what appears to be a hemorrhoid based on your judgement, according to what I have said in the previous section about treating ulcers with cautery.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And cure the wound until it heals.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter 74.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of perforation of a wound in the mother.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Many types of abscesses occur in the mother, such as cancer, hard abscess, ulcers, abscesses, herpes, fistulas, hemorrhoids, ruptures, and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	I have already mentioned these illnesses and their types and symptoms, and the cures for them in the previous section.[/PI>
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And it is necessary for me to mention in this treatise the boil that comes in the mother when one of the abscesses bursts and if you want to know how the operation of it with iron is done.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Therefore, you should consider if the pain of the abscess at its onset is sharp with percussion and flexion and fever, and sometimes it reddens and emits pus above it. If so, then do not perform perforation of it, but instead cure it by helping the maturation process until the acuteness of the symptoms subsides.[ \>
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then you should have the woman sit on a chair with two seats; and recline her back on her side and adjust her legs below the lower part of her belly, and spread her thighs apart, and place her arms below her knees, and bind each one appropriately.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the midwife should follow with the lancet and administer the instrument that opens the orifice of the mother, the form of which will come in those cases that are made later.[ \>
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And it is necessary when you want to administer this instrument that you insert with the edge the prepuce of the mother (vulva) of the woman, and the part that enters the mother should not be more than the width of the prepuce and gentle to the patient. [ >
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the width of the prepuce of the mother, then it is necessary that you place pulvills (small pieces of soft material) on the surface of the prepuce of the mother so that the entire instrument is prevented from entering the prepuce of the mother.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And it is necessary that you place the grease (or possibly "fever" in this context) that runs on the surface of the lancet blade above and that the one who administers holds the instrument and turns the grease (or fever) until the orifice of the mother is opened.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the incision is made, and it is touched with the hand and is bleeding and wet, then it is necessary that you dry it with a piece of cloth or sponge.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the pus is evacuated, then it is necessary that you place a wick soaked in rose oil or oil with styptic properties on the wound; and place the bandage on the incision in the prepuce of the mother.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And place outside the mother and on top of the bandage (or possibly "belly" in this context) clean wool soaked in water with crushed marshmallows added to it.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And then it should be treated with ointment for two days, using an amount that is appropriate until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And sometimes the mother and the wound are washed with water and honey, and also with water in which rosemary or long-leafed aristolochia has been boiled, and then return to the ointment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is deep in the mother's womb, then it is necessary that you refrain from treating it with iron and instead cure it with what has been said in the previous section.
Capitol .lxxv.	Capital LXXV.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach midwives how fetal beings are treated when born according to an unnatural form (monstrosity).
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	It is necessary that the midwife recognizes in the beginning the form of a normal childbirth through its signs, and this is that when you see the woman pushing at the lower parts and desires to smell the air, and she is relieved by what is above her (the baby), and hastens the expulsion of the fetus, then know that this birth is according to the natural form, and it is the expulsion of it upon its head, and the afterbirth attached to or hanging from the umbilical cord.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore, when you see those signs, it is necessary to compress the woman's belly so that the fetus descends easily because when it emerges on its head, give her the afterbirth, and clean it of those excesses with good cleaning.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	But if this birth is unnatural and blameworthy, because when the fetus emerges on its feet and its body is emerging in front of its head and its legs or one arm are outside (or "at the pe" in the original text, which is unclear), or it emerges with the head and one arm or the belly first, and turns very quickly onto its neck (or "col" in the original text), resembling those unnatural forms (of monstrosities).
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	Therefore, it is necessary for the midwife to be knowledgeable and skilled in all of those cases (of childbirth), and that she avoids errors and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I have shown the entire figure of those (cases), and what signs are in them, so that they can be interpreted by that and stand for them.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the baby has emerged on its head due to natural labor, and it is heavy on the woman and makes her delivery difficult, and sometimes its strength is already weakened, then do this: have her sit up or have her hold (the baby), and evaporate the mucus from it with a fig of fenugreek and warm oil.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then the midwife should insert her small, split spatula between the woman's teeth and use it to detach the afterbirth or cut it with her fingernail until the watery substance in it is expelled.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press on the woman's belly until the afterbirth is expelled.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not come out (the afterbirth), then the woman should be treated with a poultice of powdered myrtle and ground fenugreek seeds mixed with crushed chickpeas.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And approach the patient, and tell them to tightly compress their chest and make them sneeze using some method; and keep their mouth and nose covered for an hour, for this will cause the foul air to be expelled immediately.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two hands of the patient are initially trembling, then you must slowly and gradually bring them back to normal.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if they do not obey the treatment, then place a woman on a stool and lift the patient's legs up, and have the stool knocked against the ground; and make sure that the woman does not fall during this concussion.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the hands are not returned to their normal position and the patient dies, then make an incision in the hands and extract the foreign object or bind the arms to your body with a cloth and pull it out gently, for this will cause the foul air to be expelled.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	On the positioning of the fetus on its feet in the womb.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is on its feet, then you must press gently on its back to turn it over, and gradually knead it and massage it, and then take one of its legs and slowly stretch it out.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But if it has become stuck between the thighs, then tell the patient to push, and make them sneeze using some method, for this will cause the fetus to be expelled if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not expelled using the methods described, then gradually return the fetus to its normal position until you have restored its natural shape, for this will then cause it to be expelled with a gentle force.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if all of the above methods have failed, then take some althea root and dissolved gum, and grind them together in a mortar with a strong force, and apply it to the woman's cervix and the lower abdomen of the patient.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And perform this procedure with warm water, until you have reached the hypochondria region (the area just above the hips).
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when you see that the patient's external parts have been soothed, then apply to them a fumigation of myrtle and place it under their nose.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And after an hour of fumigation, then place the patient on a stool and make them sneeze and clear their throat, and then lift them up and apply gentle pressure to the lowest part of their abdomen, for the fetus will soon be expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Delivery of the fetus on its hands and feet.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus comes out in this manner (feet-first), then you must gently insert your hands and guide its arms out one at a time. The woman should be positioned on her elbows with her legs hanging down and resting on the bed, while you complete the delivery of the arms.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then gently press down on the woman's abdomen to help guide the legs out, and gradually extract what is below the feet from the thighs until it is ready to come out from the lower part of the birth canal.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	If the fetus has not yet been expelled, then take hold of its legs and move them vigorously to help pull it out. At the same time, apply gentle pressure to the area just above the hips until the fetus moves upwards towards the birth canal.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then guide its arms out and massage the fetus gently as you gradually deliver it. Continue to encourage the woman to push until the fetus is completely expelled.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Delivery of a fetus lying horizontally with one of its arms extended.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	If the arm cannot be guided back into the correct position, then lift the woman's hips and make her change position.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	If changing position does not help, then have her lie on her back and apply strong pressure to her hips with repeated blows or shocks, while also administering soothing remedies and recommending mucilaginous foods.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	Once the delivery is complete, place the woman on a stool and focus on guiding the arm back into its proper position, then massage the fetus gently to return it to its natural shape. Encourage the woman to sneeze and instruct her to push until the afterbirth is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Delivery of a fetus with its arms extended and its back facing its mother's spine.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	The midwife should hold the fetus and gently turn it while easing it out.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And once it has emerged and as soon as it is possible, place it on the woman's abdomen as we have recommended, using oil and mucilaginous substances.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then you should encourage the woman to breastfeed gradually, and once that is done, place her on a stool with her legs hanging down and slightly inclined to one side, and apply gentle pressure to help expel any remaining placenta. Encourage her to sneeze to aid in this process.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	Delivery of a prepared fetus lying on its side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When it is time to cut the umbilical cord according to this method, pay attention and then proceed to make a small incision with your fingernail until it is fully drained of fluid.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	If the fetus is hanging by its face or neck, then make an incision with a lancet to ensure that it is not constricted and can be safely delivered.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And then gently push the fetus back into the birth canal until it is in the correct position, and instruct the woman to take deep breaths to help expel it with a gentle force, if God wills it.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Delivery of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are often born several times, and sometimes even three or four, but this is rare and happens late; but it is due to natural causes and they are not alive.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And it is said that in the case of multiple fetuses, sometimes one is attached to the other by a membrane and must be separated from it by cutting through the connecting tissue at the navel. Each fetus will have its own set of ligaments, and some may be delivered naturally with gentle force, while others may require more difficult or non-standard methods as we have recommended.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if the abscesses are difficult to mature and reach what we said about unnatural figures, then you cure them as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife skillfully does this with ease and subtlety, and with delay, and acts according to every figure as it is prepared by her cunning, leading to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	The remembrance of what is formed in the uterus from embryos and is aborted.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some women have multiple pregnancies, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, or even ten fetuses, and I have verified that one woman aborts and gives birth to five, while another delivers all ten, a result brought about by the calculations of wise men.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all of this falls under the knowledge/science of the midwife because she easily recognizes a similar appearance in that, and therefore she opposes it with what is appropriate.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter seventy-six.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you cure the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of medicine and it does not come out, and you are forced to use surgery with your hand, then it is necessary that you consider if the woman has good health and does not suffer from any of the accidents for which there is a fear of loss/risk.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then it is necessary for the woman to be positioned on her back on a bed, and her head should be tilted downwards and her thighs raised upwards.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the minister should hold her from both sides or be tied to the bed in order to prevent her body from extending during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you should moisten the mouth of the woman with warm oils and with marshmallow mucilage, as well as with fenugreek and flax seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucilages, and then gently insert her hand into the uterus, and then carefully search for the place in which she can hook her fingers onto the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And place incisions there: then consider if the fetus is positioned to descend upon the mother's abdomen, and in that case, place the forceps on the heels of the baby, or on its neck, or in its mouth, or on the palate, or below the beard, or on the baby's shoulder blades, or under the ribs.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if it is descending toward the baby's feet, then in the perineum or in the middle of the ribcage.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And it is necessary to hold the forceps with the right hand and place the curve of them in the location that is between the fingers of the left hand, and gently insert the forceps into one of those locations that we have mentioned, until reaching the cause of the problem.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and hold another forceps or the third one, if necessary, in apposition to it, so that there is traction and not just extension according to its natural shape.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And it is better in every way, so that the incision may be eased as well as when a tooth is extracted.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in that area between them that extension be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife must anoint some of her mentioned remedies with oil and introduce them there and rotate them with what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the baby is prolapsed, then the forceps should be rotated into the location that is more open; and do so until the entire baby has been delivered.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if one hand is outside before the other and it is not possible to reduce it due to its constriction, then a cloth must be wrapped around it; and then pull it out until it is fully delivered, and make an incision in it at the joint of the hand or the fingers.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And it is also necessary to do the same for the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the baby's head is large or there is constriction in the delivery, or if there is water trapped in its head, then it is necessary to insert the spatula-like instrument and split the head open and extract the water, or else use an instrument called an "alundat," which has a similar shape to the other instruments described in this text.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Similarly, it should be done if the baby has a naturally large head: and then it is necessary to make an incision in it with a scalpel, or else use an instrument called an "alundat" as we have mentioned; and then extract the bones using forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head has emerged but is constricted at the shoulders, then it should be split open in order to release the fluid in the feet.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if there are no complications and the delivery is not obstructed, then you should make an incision in the head as soon as it is possible for you to do so.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the lower abdomen of the mother is affected by an abscess or edema, then you should puncture it to release the fluid that has accumulated there.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the baby is positioned feet-first (breech), then the traction required to deliver it will be lighter and its descent towards the mother's birth canal will be easier.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if the baby is stuck with its belly and feet pressed against the mother's pelvis, then you should extract the cloth that you have wrapped around your hand, and make an incision in the mother's abdomen and pelvis to release what is inside.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other limbs are obstructed and the head is turned back, then the midwife should insert her left hand; but if the mother's vagina is narrow, then she should insert her hand into the labia and search for the head with it, and pull it towards the mother's vagina. Then she should insert one or two forceps into it, and pull it out with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	But if the mother's vagina is constricted due to an abscess caused by a stone, then it should not be pressed or forced open; instead, moist and fatty substances should be administered.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer poultices, and follow the patient with warm and moist treatments.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the abscess is on his side, then if possible, it should be lanced, and administered what we have said in the case of a living person.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then make an incision in layers and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And it is necessary to remove all causes of inflammation from the wound.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your entire operation, then administer what we have said about the treatment of abscesses that arise from wounds.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if bleeding occurs, then apply stiptic waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	I have seen a woman in whose belly a dead fetus was, and then another pregnancy occurred over that same location, and the second fetus also died.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	An abscess occurred in your belly for a long time, and it became so swollen that pus burst out, and the arm began to swell as well.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	I was called upon to treat him, and I treated him for a long time, but the wound did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied strong-attraction plasters to him for certain causes, and extracted a bone from him, and after several days, another bone came out; and I was greatly surprised that there could be bones in the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	Then I considered that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I investigated the wound and extracted many bones from it, the woman being in a state of great anxiety, but she lived for a long time afterwards, with only a small part of her arm remaining.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not find it strange, because in this matter there is science and assistance for the physician who skillfully administers treatment with his hands.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	The shape of a lancet with which the womb is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the shape of a stretcher in which the limbs are held, with two handles at both ends of two pieces of wood.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this handle must be thinner than the stretcher and made either of ivory or boxwood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each piece of wood should be two fingers and the edge of each should be one finger wide, and the length of each should be a palm and a half; and in place of the two pieces of wood there should be two joints of the same piece of wood that are already fastened, the length of which is a little more than a palm, and the width of each should be two fingers or slightly more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions should be inserted in the mouth of the womb so that it can be opened with them when you turn the prescribed handles.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another form similar to it, but thinner and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of boxwood or ebony, similar to forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the end of it there are two additional parts, and the length of these additional parts is a palm, and the width of each is two digits.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the womb with these, then have the woman lie on her back with her legs apart and her buttocks raised.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	Then open your hand with the instrument like you would do with forceps, according to how much of the opening of the womb you want to make, until the midwife does what she wants.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The shape of a lancet that the ancients called:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	The shape of an instrument used to push the fetus:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	The shape of a compressor with which the large head is contained.
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps, with teeth at the end, and sometimes this instrument is made long like forceps according to this shape, with teeth like a saw that are used for cutting and containing.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	The shape of a small compressor:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	The shape of a hook with a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	The shape of a hook with two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	The shape of forceps with serrated teeth used to contain the head of the fetus.
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	The shape of a spatula having two ends used to cut off the head:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	The shape of two broad spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All of these instruments should be practiced with and as their species are multiplied and prepared by the craftsmen, the lighter they will be for their operation and more useful they will be for people according to their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not be afraid to use these instruments whenever necessary, because their necessity cannot be avoided.
De extraccio de la segondina.	On the extraction of abscesses:
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the abscess is retained during childbirth, it is necessary to command the woman to hold her breath, and then have her sneeze with caution, and place your hand on her mouth and nostrils; if it comes out by itself, that's good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	If not, then take a sponge and make a hole in it, put inside it herbs that are wet with the mouth of the womb, such as chamomile, rue, anise, camomile, Arabic spikenard, cinnamon wood, and storax.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All of these herbs or some of them should be submerged in water in the sponge, and then place it over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed cannula in the mouth of the womb and keep it inside so that the vapor reaches the cavity of the womb.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then induce her to sneeze as we have said, and the abscess will come out quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment does not work and the abscess does not come out, then order the midwife to dip her left hand in sesame oil or marshmallow ointment, and then insert it into the abscess cavity and search for it with her fingers. Once she has found it, then gently pull on it little by little, taking care not to tear the membranes of the womb.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Beforehand, make sure that the patient's right and left sides are even (symmetrical).
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust the amount of traction, because it will obey and avoid adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mother's mouth is obstructed, we have already recommended the treatment with emetic (sternutation) and medication for the pain with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled with all the recommended causes, then be careful not to repeat the process of abstraction. Instead, make sure that what comes out of her mouth from the mother goes to the woman's thigh and then cauterize it with ointment and tetrafarmacon (a type of medical salve). This will cause it to rot and dissolve in a few days and be expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it begins to rot, it will cause harm to the patient's head and stomach, and then it is necessary to administer sub-fumigations and appropriate treatments for this.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But the ulcers of the Ancients were already treated with sub-fumigation of nitric acid and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The form of an instrument with which the woman is sub-fumigated should be for the retention of menstruation and secondines (afterbirth):
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of glass or earthenware.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the thin end should be placed in the woman's vagina and the wide end above the fire, and the sub-fumigation should be placed on top of the coals.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep it in place until the sub-fumigation is consumed and then replace it with another one.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	On the treatment of an unperforated child's bottom (rectal area).
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	The mouths of infants are sucking and their bottoms (rectal area) are not perforated, which is subtle and blocked (closed).
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Therefore, it is the midwife's responsibility to perforate that blockage with her finger; and if not, then perforate it with a sharp spatula, but be careful not to touch the artery.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	Then place wool soaked in wine and oil over it (the perforated area); and treat it with an appropriate ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it will become blocked again, then insert a cannula in the tract for several days and remove it when the child wants to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And sometimes the anus becomes blocked due to consolidation from inflammation or abscess; in this case, it is necessary to incise that consolidation and treat it with what we have said about treatment and lead. (plom = lead)
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	On the treatment of fistulas that occur afterwards (develop later).
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that occur in the lower part, below, are knots and thickenings which occur near the anus or in the space of one side.
E es una fistula o motas.	"And it is a fistula or many."
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	"And when that knot is old and has run out of wet and white putrefied substance or fine powder, some of these fistulas have penetrated."
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	"And those that penetrate are known by what comes out of them through the exit and flatulence; and sometimes the patient uses an exit, and it is very easy for worms to come out."
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	"And some of these fistulas, in the space, penetrate into the bladder and into the flesh of the penis; and some of them penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the groin."
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.
